title: The Vetala Cycle - A Collected Edition
description: This is a collected edition of the novels and stories that make up the critically-acclaimed Vetala Cycle, including:>> The Eyes of the Dead with chapter-by-chapter commentary>> Shapes in the Mist with chapter-by-chapter commentary>> Hell’s Teeth with chapter-by-chapter commentary>> Two short stories: The Last Post & The End of War>> A Creation myth poem: The Song of the Cycle>> Deleted scenes from The Eyes of the Dead>> Alternate endings to Shapes in the Mist & Hell’s Teeth>> A Preview of the next Vetala Cycle set in WWII: From the Shadows, I hear Screams
author: G.R. Yeates
